sn45.48:1.2: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn45.48:1.3: ‘kimatthiyam, avuso, samane gotame brahmacariyam vussati’ti, evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn45.48:1.5: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn45.48:1.6: ‘atthi panavuso, maggo, atthi patipada anupadaparinibbanaya’ti, evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn45.48:1.7: ‘atthi kho, avuso, maggo, atthi patipada anupadaparinibbanaya’ti.
sn45.48:1.8: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo, katama ca patipada anupadaparinibbanaya?
sn45.48:1.11: Ayam, bhikkhave, maggo, ayam patipada anupadaparinibbanayati.
sn45.48:1.12: Evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha”ti.
